#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007

typedef long long LL;

LL dp[1000006];

void pre_process()
{
    dp[0]=1;
    dp[1]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
    {
        dp[i]=dp[i-1]+dp[i-2];
        dp[i]=dp[i]%mod;
    }
}

int main()
{
    int test;
    pre_process();
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        printf("%d\n", dp[n]);
    }
}
